feels.name: Annoyance
feels.quote: She was being dragged out into the maze of shouting, stamping, yelling dancers.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Valancy ran as she had never run before, clinging tight to Barney’s hand, wondering why she did not drop dead in such a mad scamper.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: It was at this moment that she saw Barney Snaith looking in over the heads of the crowd at the doorway.

feels.name: Disgust
feels.quote: Valancy was feeling disgusted and repentant. Why had she ever come to such a place?

feels.name: Shame
feels.quote: She was ashamed of the whole affair—ashamed of her folly in going—ashamed of being found in such a place by Barney Snaith.

feels.name: Gratitude
feels.quote: So he had actually come up to look after her.

Places.name: Chidley_Corners_Dance
Places.description: A rowdy dance event at Chidley Corners.

Places.name: Pine_Woods
Places.description: A quiet corner in the pine woods where Valancy and Barney sought refuge.
